trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> control displays an advertisement on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>控件在页上显示播发。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AdCreatedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建一个 AdCreatedEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
